MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G75 postcode area of East Kilbride. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:05pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of damaged and unsafe equipment within the Wardlaw substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:42pm on Monday, 11th January 2021
